article.title: Zsh Nomatch Command With Caret
article.author: Fahmi Achmad
article.excerpt: So today i learn that zsh on bare bones setting have this caret/(^) character filtered, causing can't execute command with that character. after some reading i came up with some solutions.

authors.bio: Fullstack Developer. Love to share and learn. Programmer on the day, Pro-gamer at night \m/.
authors.name: Fahmi Achmad
